name: TeaTaster
0:
”Alexa, ask Tea Taster to recommend me a tea”
”Alexa, tell Tea Taster to give me something”
”Alexa, ask Tea Taster for a new tea”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: tea taster
des: The Tea Taster has impeccable taste and a wide variety of teas to recommend. Let Tea Taster select the perfect tea, custom-tailored for you in this moment.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
